lines.text: Mata Hari stops at nothing. Nothing comes between Mata Hari and what she wants.
Isn't it marvelous what a new dress will do, huh?
G for gamma, B for beta, A for alpha, Omega for open sesame.
I want to talk to you a minute. Those phone calls, there is no question about it. She's an agent, operating for the...
She's no more an agent than you are! And if you're the best the CIA can come up with, this country is in big trouble!
Now look here! We'll have to detain her.
Mrs Nelson can leave here whenever she wishes!
What's that noise?
What? Oh, well I locked her in the closet.
Hey! What in heavens name do you think you're doing?
You talkin' to me?
Yes I'm talking to you! That's my suit on your line!
Oh I'm sorry... that's a funny looking suit.
It's my mermaid tail. and would you please throw it back?
Well it's kind of difficult. it's all tangled. Why don't you come aboard, and I'll untangle it for you
Well THAT's a little difficult too, since I'm BOTTOMLESS!
You wouldn't hit a coward, would you?
Donna, may I borrow a dime please? I have to call my dog.
Hey! You're the mermaid
Yes, I'm the mermaid
Didn't recognize you with your clothes on.
She's a pretty strange acting female.
What are you drinking?
Hootch. That's half Scotch, half Bourbon.
It sounds delicious.
Aaah! Aaah! Who are you? Who is he?
Zack Malloy, my partner. He drops in every now and then to molest women.
That sign over there, that says "No Fishing".
I wasn't exactly fishing.
Then what were you doing?
Maybe I was hunting for mermaids.
I'm going to have you arrested.
They're going to have you arrested, for going around without your bottom.
Widow! That's like catnip.
Well, not for that cat!

This is called The Clean Room. It's completely sterilized so that no dust or dirt will contaminate the critical parts. Workers entering the clean room must first stand on this grate, which shakes off dust from shoes and clothing. Like this... Oh dear, I guess we better go now. We'll go that way.
[her shoe is stuck in the grate]
We never did get to introduce ourselves did we?
Well let's leave it that way, shall we?
It just seems I know owe you one shoe and one mermaid's tail.

[gets his foot stuck in a waste basket]
I cannot go through life like this?
Your heel is in my ingrown.
Are you or are you not the girl in the glass bottom boat?
I are ?
...And I'm partial to blonde foreign agents. Is that it?
Who are you? Who is he?
Who is Vladimir?
Look out Jenny! Look out!
Hey! Out of the way!
"Vladimir Sent Me". Over!

[sings]
The Glass Bottom Boat you will agree, will show you the magic of the deep blue sea.
Gismo? You are a spy!
I haven't felt like this since Culver Military Academy.
